verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>. A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> makes a <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>: but a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H8424>heaviness<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>.
<S%H214>Treasures<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H6666>nothing<s%>: but righteousness <S%H5337>delivers<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H7456>allow<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to <S%H7456>famish<s%>: but he casts <S%H1920>away<s%> the <S%H1942>substance<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
He becomes <S%H7326>poor<s%> that <S%H6213>deals<s%> with a <S%H7423>slack<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%>: but the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> makes <S%H6238>rich<s%>.

He that <S%H103>gathers<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> is a <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>: but he that <S%H7290>sleeps<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> that causes <S%H954>shame<s%>.
<S%H1293>Blessings<s%> are upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%>: but <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
The <S%H2143>memory<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed<s%>: but the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H7537>rot<s%>.
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%>: but a <S%H8193>prating<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall<s%>.
He that <S%H3212>walks<s%> <S%H8537>uprightly<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H983>surely<s%>: but he that <S%H6140>perverts<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%>.
He that <S%H7169>winks<s%> with the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5414>causes<s%> <S%H6094>sorrow<s%>: but a <S%H8193>prating<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall<s%>.
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man is a <S%H4726>well<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>: but <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
<S%H8135>Hatred<s%> stirs <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H4090>strifes<s%>: but <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> all <S%H6588>sins<s%>.

In the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of him that has <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%>: but a <S%H7626>rod<s%> is for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of him that is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
<S%H2450>Wise<s%> men lay <S%H6845>up<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H4288>destruction<s%>.
The rich <S%H6223>man<s%>'s <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>: the <S%H4288>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is their <S%H7389>poverty<s%>.
The <S%H6468>labor<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> tends to <S%H2416>life<s%>: the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
He is in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> that <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>: but he that <S%H5800>refuses<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H8582>errs<s%>.
He that <S%H3680>hides<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%> with <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>, and he that <S%H3318>utters<s%> a <S%H1681>slander<s%>, is a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> there is no <S%H2308>lack<s%> of <S%H6588>sin<s%>: but he that <S%H2820>refrains<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> is <S%H7919>wise<s%>.
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is as <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>: the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is of little <S%H4592>worth<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>: but <S%H191>fools<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H2638>want<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom<s%>.
The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, it makes <S%H6238>rich<s%>, and he <S%H3254>adds<s%> no sorrow with <S%H6089>it<s%>.
It is as <S%H7814>sport<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2154>mischief<s%>: but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> has <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
The <S%H4034>fear<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, it shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H8378>him<s%>: but the desire of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%>.
As the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%>, so is the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> no <S%H6662>more<s%>: but the righteous is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3247>foundation<s%>.
As <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to the <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, and as <S%H6227>smoke<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, so is the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> to them that send <S%H7971>him<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3254>prolongs<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: but the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7114>shortened<s%>.
The <S%H8431>hope<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H8057>gladness<s%>: but the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H4581>strength<s%> to the <S%H8537>upright<s%>: but <S%H4288>destruction<s%> shall be to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>removed<s%>: but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H7931>inhabit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> brings <S%H5107>forth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: but the <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>out<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> what is <S%H7522>acceptable<s%>: but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> speaks <S%H8419>perverseness<s%>.
